data.question: What is the title of the article?
data.answer: A Monomeric MnIII−Peroxo Complex Derived Directly from Dioxygen

data.question: Who is the corresponding author of the study?
What is the primary focus of the study?
data.answer: The study focuses on the binding and activation of dioxygen by transition metal complexes, specifically leading to the detection of a new peroxomanganese(III) complex.

data.question: True or False: The peroxomanganese(III) complex is low-spin with a g value of 8.2.
What method was used to establish the coordination of a peroxo ligand in the complex?
What reaction is complex 2 capable of that is a known reaction of peroxometal complexes?
True or False: The preparation of the precursor 1 involves treating H5bupa with 3 equivalents of KH in dimethylacetamide.
What is the yield of the new green species (2) when diphenylhydrazine is added to the reaction mixture?
True or False: The molecular structure of 1 shows a six-coordinate MnII complex.
What is the ground state spin value of the peroxomanganese(III) complex as determined by EPR spectroscopy?
True or False: The isotopic labeling studies with 18O2 did not result in any shift in the FTIR spectrum.
What is the mass-to-charge ratio (m/z) of the 16O-isotopomer of complex 2 as determined by electrospray ionization mass spectra?
True or False: The formation of complex 2 from O2 at room temperature disproves the possibility of mononuclear peroxoMn(III) production.
What is the visible absorbance band λmax of complex 2?
True or False: The reaction of complex 2 with cyclohexanecarboxaldehyde does not produce cyclohexanone.
What is the role of diphenylhydrazine in the preparation of complex 2?
data.answer: It increases the yield of complex 2 to nearly 80% and is converted to azobenzene.

data.question: True or False: The study provides a direct comparison between the peroxomanganese(III) complex and peroxo intermediates in cytochrome P450.
What is the shift in the FTIR band when 18O2 is used instead of 16O2 in the preparation of complex 2?
True or False: The study confirms the presence of intramolecular hydrogen bonds in the molecular structure of 1.
What is the significance of the observed vibrational change between the 16O2 and 18O2 isotopomers in the study?
data.answer: It supports the presence of a peroxo ligand coordinated to the MnIII center in complex 2.
